children.subject: <md>I would recommend asking this also on the CogSci piazza!</md>

history.content: There are deadlines to declare for the College of Letters and Science, so you need to pay attention to those even if Cog Sci doesn't have any rules (e.g., you can't declare in your final semester). L&S CS doesn't actually have the requirement you mention; that's just the earliest you can apply, and it's meant to get you priority for upper div classes as quickly as possible. You would not need to retake courses if you missed that deadline. Look at the Cog Sci Department's website and find their undergrad advisor's name and send them an e-mail and ask.

Computer Science has a requirement to send the major declaration no later than the 30th of the last month I finish its prereqs. Does cog sci have a similar thing? I finished my prereqs about a year ago but I haven't declared it so I don't know if I would have to retake those classes or if cog sci doesn't have this restriction to declare.
history.subject: Is there a deadline to declare Cog Sci?
